identifier: The Catena-X common ontology lists all domain-independent classes, attributes and relations.

definition_en: An entity that exists in a physical form (matter, material).
synonyms_en: material entity, physical object, material object, concrete object, tangible, material, physical

definition_en: An entity that exists in a non-physical form (mental, intangible).
example_en: idea, concept, information,  knowledge, feeling, domain, idea, concept, object, domain, plan
synonyms_en: immaterial entity, non-physical object, immaterial object, abstract object, intangible, immaterial, mental, non-material

definition_en: A Business Partner is a legal entity that is part of the Catena-X network or that stands in a relevant relation to a Catena-X Business Partner.
The (long) Business Partner Number is a unique identifier following the pattern 'BPNL[0-9]{8}[A-Z]{4}'.
The (long) Business Partner Number Type describes strings following the pattern 'BPNL[0-9]{8}[A-Z]{4}'.
An Asset is any artifact that is provisioned/owned/attributed to some Catena-X Business Partner.
The provisioned by predicate connects assets to their providing Catena-X Business Partner.
An intermediate product is a product that is used as a raw material or ingredient in the production of other products.
synonyms_en: intermediate goods, producer goods, semi-finished products

definition_en: A single, identifiable product instance (e.g. a laptop with a particular serial number).
A specification is a document that outlines the requirements for a product, system, or service.
A string that identifies either a unique object or a unique class of objects.

example_en: global unique identifier (GUID), universally unique identifier (UUID)

definition_en: A unique identifier assigned incrementally or sequentially to an item, to uniquely identify it.

synonyms_en: si system, international system of units

note_en: activity referred to a radionuclide (decays per unit time)

synonyms_en: is part of, composing of, built in, assembled in, fragment of, division of, component-integral relation
consists of, formed from, assembled from

synonyms_de: ist Mitglied von, war Mitglied von

definition_en: entity located within this entity but not part of it

identifier: STandard for the Exchange of Product model data

definition_en: The AAS is the digital representation of an asset (real or virtual).
A digital twin is a digital representation of an objects (real or virtual) from the real world. Are intended for data exchange.
